title: Bug 11903'add javadoc comment' adds nonjava doc comments
description: Bug 11903'add javadoc comment' adds nonjava doc comments 1.
SR: (default codegeneration preference settings)2. select the method and 'add javadoc comment'package p;class A{public String toString() {return super.toString();}}it adds/@see ObjecttoString() /which is not a javadoc comment
